a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Income inequality: Gini coefficient in Latin America, 1974 to 2022
The Gini coefficient measures inequality on a scale from 0 to 1. Higher values indicate higher inequality.
Data source: SEDLAC (CEDLAS and The World Bank) (2024)
